ygData.subject: Re: Rambling a bit, was: Re: [EQ_women] Marriage question......
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Christina!
:o)

<< Basicly it's up to you to decide what is and is not
acceptable in how you interact with people in the
game. >>

Yes, of course.
:o)
As my subject said I was only rambling a bit though.
I'm afraid I tend to do that a lot.
:o)

<< You can create your own emotes in the following
way: /me slaps Joewoodelf That will make the game say
Brangvyne slaps Joewoodelf >>

Ah, cool, I knew you could create your own emotes, but
didn't know how to set that up exactly.
:o)

<< There are no easy answers to personal interactions,
you need to figure that stuff out yourself. My advice
is have fun and try to not unnecessarily hurt people's
feelings, while at the same time ensuring people
respect your boundaries. >>

Yeah, your right of course. As I said just chatting
more than anything. I am having fun, otherwise I
wouldn't be playing the game or here talking about it,
but I am aware that I tend to run on sometimes.

:o)
Brangvyne

PS - If I'm "chatting" to much, or anything I say
bothers anyone, or is just out of line or topic or
whatever for the list someone is welcome to just tell
me to shut up. I sometimes get carried away but I'm
not offended if someone says enough already.
